headline: Ask HN: Are Vercel/Netlify/Cloudflare pushing SSR/ESR to increase their revenue?
description:
I've been thinking about this for quite some time. Some backstory.

When I first got introduced to web development around 2011 at university, the majority of the course was utilizing Apache Netbeans. What a nightmare that was.

What got me excited was the 30 minutes of our last lecture where the teacher talked about client-side rendering using jQuery + external APIs. According to him, it was a fly that will be forgotten in a year or two. For me it was what got me hooked on web development.

I then worked at multiple companies doing server-side rendering to get around the problem slow clients. That made a lot of sense back in the day.

The move towards static-site generation(SSG) also made a lot of sense and felt like a fresh breath of air after years of slow and uncached wordpress sites taking over the web.

But now, 10 years later, I feel like I am seeing the whole industry loop around with the recent move on rendering everything on the edge aka. Edge-Side Rendering(ESR).

I get it, faster websites, more money. It is also more inclusive for users with slower devices. But I'd argue that the decentralization of computation by devices own by users is better than moving towards centralization of this computation.

So for me, the elephant in the room is how this new revenue stream is being created by cloud providers and how they push us toward SSG and ESR. Promoting it as a holly grail when SSG and ISG would suffice for the majority of use cases and eventually save everybody a lot of money.

What am I missing?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Vercel/Netlify/Cloudflare是否在推动SSR/ESR以增加其收入？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Vercel/Netlify/Cloudflare是否在推動SSR/ESR以增加其收入？
description_zh-Hans:
我一直在思考这个问题，已经有一段时间了。

当我在2011年左右第一次在大学里接触到Web开发时，课程的大部分内容都是利用Apache Netbeans。

让我感到兴奋的是，在最后一节课的30分钟里，老师谈到了使用jQuery和外部API进行客户端渲染的问题。据他说，那是一个在一两年内就会被遗忘的苍蝇。对我来说，是它让我迷上了web开发。

后来我在多家公司工作，做服务器端渲染，以解决慢速客户端的问题。

向静态网站生成(SSG)的转变也很有意义，在多年来缓慢和未缓存的wordpress网站占据网络之后，感觉像是一股新鲜的空气。

但是，10年后的今天，我感觉我看到整个行业在循环，最近在边缘渲染一切，也就是边缘渲染(ESR)的举措。

我明白，网站更快，赚钱更多。对于使用慢速设备的用户来说，这也更具有包容性。但我认为，由用户拥有的设备进行的分散计算比走向集中计算要好。

因此，对我来说，房间里的大象是云提供商如何创造这个新的收入流，以及他们如何推动我们走向SSG和ESR。 当SSG和ISG足以满足大多数用例并最终为每个人节省大量资金时，他们却将其作为圣杯来推广。

我错过了什么？
